summary: Provides a PyTorch Dataset that reads paired 3D MRI scans and their segmentation masks, splits each volume into fixed‑size sub‑volumes using a configurable stride, optionally applies data augmentations, handles soft label maps, supports modality dropout, and can cache processed patches on disk for faster repeated loading.
business_intent: Enable efficient preparation of large 3D medical imaging datasets for training and evaluating deep learning segmentation models, reducing memory overhead and I/O latency while offering flexible preprocessing options.
